description.intro_text: Kreirajte bez ograničenja with Creation 55: a complete flooring solution offering ultra-realistične designs, versatile formats and besprekorna harmonija — Idealno za novu gradnju projects, perfect for offices, small shops, hospitality and more
description.full_text:
Dizajn i proizvod
Kreirajte bez ograničenja
Kompletna ponuda formata: XL rectangular tiles, XL square tiles, standard planks, XL planks, small planks - designed to meet every project need
Expanded parquet-style formats: herringbone, Hungarian point, Versailles tiles - timeless sophistication with a modern twist
Profinjena rešenja & harmonične palete boja: every detail crafted to create exclusiv space
Novi površinski utisci: ultra-realistične and raznovrsne teksture that elevate each design
Ultra-matt finish with Protecshield™: baršunasti dodir and prirodna elegancija
Smart Design – up to 3sqm of design variation: poboljšana vizuelna varijacija on selected designs for dublja realističnost
Smart Comfort innovation: acoustic top layer for better walking (79dB) and thermal comfort
4 bevelled edges: autentičan drveni and efekat pločica
From floor to wall: create besprekorna harmonija with our Mural Revela Collection
Ugradnja i održavanje
Dry Back sistem: profesionalna ugradnja for dugotrajna performansa
Ideal for new
